variants.text: This event is packed with compelling stories - from breakthrough biotech innovations to the investors backing Europe's next generation of bio-based companies. You'll have access to founders, VCs, and scientists all in one place.

The {{event_name}} showcases cutting-edge innovations in synthetic biology and biotech - exactly the kind of future-focused content your readers are interested in. You'll get direct access to the innovators behind these technologies.
variants.use_case: Focus on innovation and technology stories

variants.text: If you're covering the European startup ecosystem, this event offers unique insight into how biotech companies secure funding and bring their innovations to market. It's a microcosm of the entire bio-based innovation pipeline.

We'll facilitate exclusive interviews with participating startups, investors, and industry leaders. You'll have the opportunity to break stories about funding rounds, partnerships, and breakthrough innovations before they hit the mainstream press.

Behind every biotech startup is a compelling human story - researchers-turned-founders, bold investors betting on science, and innovations that could change lives. The {{event_name}} gives you access to these stories firsthand.
variants.use_case: Human interest and founder story angle

variants.text: We'll provide you with a press kit including high-resolution images, founder bios, company fact sheets, and interview opportunities. Everything you need to craft a compelling story about Europe's biotech future.
